name: FrogEatsMouse
description:
FrogEatsMouse Made for the LudumDare49 compo 48hrs game jam Theme: Unstable About

This game is a top down Action Shooter. You are a frog spy sent to the frog planet to kill boss frog. The planets atmosphere is unstable to our mouse body. We are sending a robot with you to provide safety shields, he may be a bit unstable...

Also be carefull, while outside the safe zone you take damage over time. Your bullets will also act funny outside the safezone, so aim carefully!. The frogs shoot out a slow beam when they come for you, makes you move way slower. If you kill the frogs, the beams go away and your back to your regular speed.

Controls

*Note if you mouse click out the window and hit spacebar the window will shift, if that happens click back in. Otherwise you can use SHIFT for standstill and the window wont move up or down*

The Player follows the mouse

Aim with mouse, and LEFTCLICK to Shoot

SHIFT or SPACE to stand still ( you can shoot while standing still )

ESCAPE for menu

Applications

Engine: p5.js

Art: p5.js, emoji's, lilypads from Aseprite

Audio: Sfxr

Music: https://tones.wolfram.com/generate/
